text:
Pattinson steams up Dior cologne ad

The handsome ‘Edward Cullen’ aka Robert Pattinson has indeed come a long way since the floppy-haired Twilight days.

In a new commercial for a Dior cologne, the 29-year-old actor makes his way through New York City, making love to the camera with an intense stare and flashing intermittent smirks at every corner, reports E! Online . — ANI
title: Robert Pattinson`s intense look in Dior ad
